title: Still waiting to receive the Rakan and Xayah icon
body: So I gifted Xayah to my brother with Ip when the 'event' was still up. It has almost been 2 weeks after that and I still didnt receive the icon. Im getting worried about that ;_;

replies.body: Hmm, yeah I see you sent a gift and should be eligible.  Since most players have already received theirs and see you are eligible, I went ahead and added it to your account.  Good luck to both you and your brother on the rift!
I too have not yet received the one for gifting
Whew, you were really close to the deadline but made it just in time.  Added!
Can I get some help? I gifted Rakan to my brother but never got my icon?
thank you
Could you please help, i still did not receive my icon as well. :(
Thanks so much!! ^^
I don't have mine yet either ;c
Hello, i have the same problem. I still have not gotten my icon. Can you please help?
Bringing the whole gang I see.  :P  Verified and added, friend!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ApzMmqln,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-05-10T15:25:08.784+0000)
>
> Bringing the whole gang I see.  :P  Verified and added, friend!

I also haven't received mine, I gifted Rakan to Calumrob using IP

I'm also still waiting on mine.

I Gifted Rakan to a friend, using RP. I could have sworn it read that gifting with RP would qualify for the icon. It's been two weeks since the end of the deadline and I'm still waiting. I definitely gifted before the April 26th Deadline :/

It seems many others are still waiting/didn't get the icon either. At least I'm not alone.

Please help me too T_T
Yup it looks like you're eligible, so I've added the icon to your account!
Thanks. You're my hero :)
gave my friend xayah on the 23 i think with ip didn't get the icon
Gifted a friend Xayah with RP on April 24th and have not received the Icon; did I miss the deadline?
Nope, you made it in time!  Icon added!
i have the same problem :/ and still haven't got it
